snippet: German news media reported that the man, 31, worked for Germany’s intelligence service and was suspected of spying for the United States.
abstract: German man is arrested in Germany on suspicion of passing secret documents to a foreign power, believed to be United States; German news media reports he had been spying for US for at least two years; arrest is latest turn in yearlong tensions with Germany over American spying.

byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington. and David E. Sanger from Weston, Vt.

lead_paragraph: German news media reported that the man, 31, worked for Germany’s intelligence service and was suspected of spying for the United States.

headline.main: German Man Arrested as Spy Implicates U.S.
headline.print_headline: German Man Is Held as Spy; U.S. Implicated
